Message.Title: firearm companies refuse to sell to gov agencies
Message.Msg: grwoing number of firearm manufactureres are refusing to sell arms to gov agencies (i.e., the police). Well, that sounds great. However the list of companies that are refusing to sell to gov are ones I've never heard of. If well known companies such as Glock and Beretta start refusing then I'd say they are on to something.

Topic.Title: firearm companies refuse to sell to gov agencies

Message.Title: Bob Woodward says obama owns sequestration
Message.Msg: or is it secastration? Anyway, that is what Bob Woodward said, not that the low information voters such as Mesa and Phil would ever acknowledge it. If Obama says repubs are to blame that's good enough for Mesa and Phil. ............................................................................................................................................................................ From the Politico: Journalism icon Bob Woodward wrote in a new Washington Post op-ed first that the sequester was the “brain child” of the White House, calling out President Barack Obama for saying it was created by Congress. “My extensive reporting for my book ‘The Price of Politics’ shows that the automatic spending cuts were initiated by the White House and were the brainchild of [Jack Lew, then-budget director during the negotiations] and White House congressional relations chief Rob Nabors — probably the foremost experts on budget issues in the senior ranks of the federal government,” Woodward wrote on a piece posted on Friday night. Woodward continued: “Obama personally approved of the plan for Lew and Nabors to propose the sequester to Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid [D-Nev.]. They did so at 2:30 p.m. July 27, 2011, according to interviews with two senior White House aides who were directly involved.”

Topic.Title: Bob Woodward says obama owns sequestration

Message.Msg: I also believe the cuts need to happen. Yes, repubs will be blamed and low information voters like Mesa and Phil will buy it. It heartens me to know that at least Bob Woodward knows and speaks the truth on the matter.

Topic.Title: Bob Woodward says obama owns sequestration

Message.Msg: Cuts. I said cuts need to happen. Truth is there are no real cuts. I mean, we're talking $85B out of a mere trillion, right? And they act as if life as we know it will end. Again, low info voters like Mesa will believe it. Further, truth is that it will be far less than 85B. Due to that gawdawful principle known as baseline budgeting where automatic increases occur each year, the cuts will not amount to 85B. In fact, I think there will be more spending than last year. How's that for a cut??

Topic.Title: Bob Woodward says obama owns sequestration

Message.Msg: I might were he to acknowledge it was his idea. But he hasn't done that, has he?
